channel.title: Cant download ChibiOs for linux 32bits instalation
channel.description:
Hello. It seems that the only chibios source available for downlod is the latest. Ive been looking for chibios 2.6.9 without any luck. Where do I get it? Why theres no linux32 install if axoloti patche is a 32b program?
Best Regards

item.title: Cant download ChibiOs for linux 32bits instalation
item.dc:creator: @gir1dhar
item.description:
@gir1dhar wrote:

In my limited experience, and I tried several times, with different distros.
Installing axolotiâ€™s client on linux is an endless bag of pain and frustration. Specially on 32bits. Unless you use an archaic distro.
My best solution was to dual boot, and have just one windows 7 32bit install just for axoloti. Hate windows, would love to use axo under linux. But the dependency on a deprecated jdk, the lack of a proper pack, makes it too much difficult and troublesome to install.

I love the axoloti once programmed and stashed into m rig.

But, oh boy, I hate the editor with a fiery passion.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant download ChibiOs for linux 32bits instalation

Hi there! Asking about Axoloti on Linux I'm interested so far how = about UbuntuStudio distribution and Axoloti running within?? There are hundreds of music & audio/video applications already installed in that distribution of Linux. Regards thnx!
